original_text: Therefore sprang there even of one, and him as good as dead, so many as the stars of the sky in multitude, and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable.
korean_text: 이러므로 죽은 자와 같은 한 사람으로 말미암아 하늘의 허다한 별과 또 해변의 무수한 모래와 같이 많은 후손이 생육하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore sprang there even of one
and him as good as dead
so many as the stars of the sky in multitude
and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바닷가의 모래처럼 셀 수 없이 많았느니라
